Hello ${user.name},

This is a reminder to update your manual KPI: ${object.name}.

Please log in and update the value as soon as possible.

Hello,

A new KPI discussion has been started: ${object.title}

KPI: ${object.kpi_name}

Discussion Type: ${object.discussion_type}

Priority: ${object.priority}

Initiated by: ${object.initiator_id.name}

Please participate in this discussion and share your insights.

Access the discussion: View Discussion

Hello ${object.assigned_to_id.name},

A new action item has been assigned to you:

Description: ${object.description}

Due Date: ${object.due_date}

Priority: ${object.priority}

Related KPI: ${object.kpi_id.name}

Discussion: ${object.discussion_id.title}

Please review and take appropriate action.

View Action Item: View Details

Hello,

A KPI approval request requires your attention:

Request: ${object.name}

Type: ${object.workflow_type}

KPI: ${object.kpi_name}

Requested by: ${object.requested_by_id.name}

Priority: ${object.priority}

% if object.workflow_type == 'target_change':

Current Target: ${object.current_target_value}

Proposed Target: ${object.proposed_target_value}

% endif

Please review and approve/reject this request.

Review Request: Review Now

Hello ${object.requested_by_id.name},

Your KPI approval request has been approved:

Request: ${object.name}

Type: ${object.workflow_type}

KPI: ${object.kpi_name}

Approved by: ${object.final_approver_id.name}

Approval Date: ${object.approval_date}

You can now implement the approved changes.

View Request: View Details

Hello ${object.requested_by_id.name},

Your KPI approval request has been rejected:

Request: ${object.name}

Type: ${object.workflow_type}

KPI: ${object.kpi_name}

Rejection Reason:

${object.rejection_reason}

Please review the feedback and submit a revised request if needed.

View Request: View Details

Hello,

A KPI coaching session has been scheduled:

Title: ${object.title}

Employee: ${object.employee_name}

Manager/Coach: ${object.manager_name}

KPI: ${object.kpi_name}

Session Date: ${object.session_date}

Duration: ${object.duration_hours} hours

Type: ${object.coaching_type}

Please prepare for this coaching session and bring any relevant materials.

View Session: View Details

Hello,

This is a reminder that you have a KPI coaching session tomorrow:

Title: ${object.title}

Employee: ${object.employee_name}

Manager/Coach: ${object.manager_name}

KPI: ${object.kpi_name}

Session Date: ${object.session_date}

Duration: ${object.duration_hours} hours

Please be prepared and on time for the session.

View Session: View Details

Hello ${object.assigned_to_id.name},

This is a reminder that your action item is due tomorrow:

Description: ${object.description}

Due Date: ${object.due_date}

Priority: ${object.priority}

Related KPI: ${object.kpi_id.name}

Discussion: ${object.discussion_id.title}

Current Progress: ${object.progress_percent}%

Please ensure this action item is completed on time.

Update Progress: Update Now

Your action item is now overdue:

Description: ${object.description}

Due Date: ${object.due_date}

Days Overdue: ${(context_today() - object.due_date).days} days
